query:
CREATE TABLE `pages` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`slug` varchar(128) NOT NULL,
	`title` varchar(256) NOT NULL,
	`contentHtml` text,
	`contentJson` text,
	`description` text,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `pages_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
	CONSTRAINT `pages_slug_unique` UNIQUE(`slug`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user czqs44QUsyTYvhK.root --database CiwxvFQvMALUxAkuS7uyUE --execute CREATE TABLE `pages` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`slug` varchar(128) NOT NULL,
	`title` varchar(256) NOT NULL,
	`contentHtml` text,
	`contentJson` text,
	`description` text,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `pages_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
	CONSTRAINT `pages_slug_unique` UNIQUE(`slug`)
);
